Interface IDifferentialDrivetrain<G extends IGearbox>

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void arcade(double translation, double rotation)
      Operates the drivetrain in "arcade" mode, meaning the translation and rotation are used to control the robot
      void both(kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<? super G,kotlin.Unit> action) 
      G getLeft() 
      G getRight() 
      double getWheelRadius()
      The geometric wheel radius of the drivetrain's wheels. This should be measured with a geometric test on the hardware.
      double getWheelbase()
      The geometric wheelbase of the drivetrain. This should be a parameter measured either in CAD or on the hardware.
      void setWheelRadius(double p)
      The geometric wheel radius of the drivetrain's wheels. This should be measured with a geometric test on the hardware.
      void setWheelbase(double p)
      The geometric wheelbase of the drivetrain. This should be a parameter measured either in CAD or on the hardware.
      void stop()
      Stops the drivetrain
      void tank(double leftSetpoint, double rightSetpoint)
      Operates the drivetrain in "tank" mode, meaning the left setpoint sets the speed of the left gearbox, and the right setpoint is applied to the right
      void updateGeometry(TankDrivetrainGeometryTemplate template)
      Updates the geometry from the template provided
